remarks: Implicit substitution of class for equivalence class.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
ectocl.1 $e |- S = ( B /. R ) $.
ectocl.2 $e |- ( [ x ] R = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ectocl.3 $e |- ( x e. B -> ph ) $.
ectocl $p |- ( A e. S -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
$d ps x $.
